MOVE_POUND.name: Pound
MOVE_POUND.description: The foe is physically pounded with a long tail or a foreleg, etc.

MOVE_KARATE_CHOP.name: Karate Chop
MOVE_KARATE_CHOP.description: The foe is attacked with a sharp chop. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

MOVE_DOUBLE_SLAP.name: Double Slap
MOVE_DOUBLE_SLAP.description: The foe is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

MOVE_COMET_PUNCH.name: Comet Punch
MOVE_COMET_PUNCH.description: The foe is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row.

MOVE_MEGA_PUNCH.name: Mega Punch
MOVE_MEGA_PUNCH.description: The foe is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

MOVE_PAY_DAY.name: Pay Day
MOVE_PAY_DAY.description: Numerous coins are hurled at the foe to inflict damage. Money is earned after battle.

MOVE_FIRE_PUNCH.name: Fire Punch
MOVE_FIRE_PUNCH.description: The foe is punched with a fiery fist. It may leave the target with a burn.

MOVE_ICE_PUNCH.name: Ice Punch
MOVE_ICE_PUNCH.description: The foe is punched with an icy fist. It may leave the target frozen.

MOVE_THUNDER_PUNCH.name: Thunder Punch
MOVE_THUNDER_PUNCH.description: The foe is punched with an electrified fist. It may leave the target with paralysis.

MOVE_SCRATCH.name: Scratch
MOVE_SCRATCH.description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the foe to inflict damage.

MOVE_VICE_GRIP.name: Vise Grip
MOVE_VICE_GRIP.description: Huge, impressive pincers grip and squeeze the foe.

MOVE_GUILLOTINE.name: Guillotine
MOVE_GUILLOTINE.description: A vicious, tearing attack with pincers. Lower’s user’s defenses by one stage.

MOVE_RAZOR_WIND.name: Razor Wind
MOVE_RAZOR_WIND.description: A two-turn attack. Blades of wind hit the foe on the second turn. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

MOVE_SWORDS_DANCE.name: Swords Dance
MOVE_SWORDS_DANCE.description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. It sharply raises the user’s Attack stat.

MOVE_CUT.name: Cut
MOVE_CUT.description: The foe is cut with a scythe or a claw. It can also be used to cut down thin trees.

MOVE_GUST.name: Gust
MOVE_GUST.description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the foe to inflict damage.

MOVE_WING_ATTACK.name: Wing Attack
MOVE_WING_ATTACK.description: The foe is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

MOVE_WHIRLWIND.name: Whirlwind
MOVE_WHIRLWIND.description: The foe is blown away, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

MOVE_FLY.name: Fly
MOVE_FLY.description: The user soars, then strikes on the second turn. It can also be used for flying to any familiar town.

MOVE_BIND.name: Bind
MOVE_BIND.description: A long body or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the foe for two to five turns.

MOVE_SLAM.name: Slam
MOVE_SLAM.description: The foe is slammed with a long tail, vines, etc., to inflict damage.

MOVE_VINE_WHIP.name: Vine Whip
MOVE_VINE_WHIP.description: The foe is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

MOVE_STOMP.name: Stomp
MOVE_STOMP.description: The foe is stomped with a big foot. It may also make the target flinch.

MOVE_DOUBLE_KICK.name: Double Kick
MOVE_DOUBLE_KICK.description: The foe is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

MOVE_MEGA_KICK.name: Mega Kick
MOVE_MEGA_KICK.description: The foe is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.

MOVE_JUMP_KICK.name: Jump Kick
MOVE_JUMP_KICK.description: The user jumps up high, then strikes with a kick. If the kick misses, the user hurts itself.

MOVE_ROLLING_KICK.name: Rolling Kick
MOVE_ROLLING_KICK.description: The user lashes  out with a quick, spinning kick. It may also make the target flinch.

MOVE_SAND_ATTACK.name: Sand Attack
MOVE_SAND_ATTACK.description: Sand is hurled in the foe’s face, reducing its accuracy.

MOVE_HEADBUTT.name: Headbutt
MOVE_HEADBUTT.description: The user attacks with its head. It may make the foe flinch. To find Pokémon, hit trees.

MOVE_HORN_ATTACK.name: Horn Attack
MOVE_HORN_ATTACK.description: The foe is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

MOVE_FURY_ATTACK.name: Fury Attack
MOVE_FURY_ATTACK.description: The foe is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

MOVE_HORN_DRILL.name: Horn Drill
MOVE_HORN_DRILL.description: The foe is stabbed with a horn rotating like a drill. -1 user Speed.

MOVE_TACKLE.name: Tackle
MOVE_TACKLE.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the foe with its whole body.

MOVE_BODY_SLAM.name: Body Slam
MOVE_BODY_SLAM.description: The user drops onto the foe with its full body weight. It may leave the foe paralyzed.

MOVE_WRAP.name: Wrap
MOVE_WRAP.description: A long body or vines are used to wrap and squeeze the foe for two to five turns.

MOVE_TAKE_DOWN.name: Take Down
MOVE_TAKE_DOWN.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the foe. It also damages the user a little.

MOVE_THRASH.name: Thrash
MOVE_THRASH.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.

MOVE_DOUBLE_EDGE.name: Double-Edge
MOVE_DOUBLE_EDGE.description: A reckless, life- risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.

MOVE_TAIL_WHIP.name: Tail Whip
MOVE_TAIL_WHIP.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making the foe less wary. The target’s Defense stat is lowered.

MOVE_POISON_STING.name: Poison Sting
MOVE_POISON_STING.description: The foe is stabbed with a poisonous barb of some sort. It may also poison the target.

MOVE_TWINEEDLE.name: Twineedle
MOVE_TWINEEDLE.description: The foe is stabbed twice by a pair of stingers. It may also poison the target.

MOVE_PIN_MISSILE.name: Pin Missile
MOVE_PIN_MISSILE.description: Sharp pins are shot at the foe in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

MOVE_LEER.name: Leer
MOVE_LEER.description: The foe is given an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The target’s Defense stat is reduced.

MOVE_BITE.name: Bite
MOVE_BITE.description: The foe is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.

MOVE_GROWL.name: Growl
MOVE_GROWL.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the foe less wary. The target’s Attack stat is lowered.

MOVE_ROAR.name: Roar
MOVE_ROAR.description: The foe is scared off, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

MOVE_SING.name: Sing
MOVE_SING.description: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the foe into a deep slumber.

MOVE_SUPERSONIC.name: Supersonic
MOVE_SUPERSONIC.description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body. It may confuse the target.

MOVE_SONIC_BOOM.name: Sonic Boom
MOVE_SONIC_BOOM.description: The foe is hit with a destructive shock wave that always inflicts 20 HP damage.

MOVE_DISABLE.name: Disable
MOVE_DISABLE.description: For several turns, this move prevents the foe from using the move it last used.

MOVE_ACID.name: Acid
MOVE_ACID.description: The foe is attacked with a spray of harsh acid. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

MOVE_EMBER.name: Ember
MOVE_EMBER.description: The foe is attacked with small flames. The target may also be left with a burn.

MOVE_FLAMETHROWER.name: Flamethrower
MOVE_FLAMETHROWER.description: The foe is scorched with an intense blast of fire. The target may also be left with a burn.

MOVE_MIST.name: Mist
MOVE_MIST.description: The user cloaks its body with a white mist that prevents any of its stats from being cut for five turns.

MOVE_WATER_GUN.name: Water Gun
MOVE_WATER_GUN.description: The foe is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

MOVE_HYDRO_PUMP.name: Hydro Pump
MOVE_HYDRO_PUMP.description: The foe is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

MOVE_SURF.name: Surf
MOVE_SURF.description: It swamps the entire battlefield with a giant wave. It can also be used for crossing water.

MOVE_ICE_BEAM.name: Ice Beam
MOVE_ICE_BEAM.description: The foe is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.

MOVE_BLIZZARD.name: Blizzard
MOVE_BLIZZARD.description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the foe. It may also freeze the target solid.

MOVE_PSYBEAM.name: Psybeam
MOVE_PSYBEAM.description: The foe is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also leave the target confused.

MOVE_BUBBLE_BEAM.name: Bubble Beam
MOVE_BUBBLE_BEAM.description: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the foe. It may also lower the target’s Speed stat.

MOVE_AURORA_BEAM.name: Aurora Beam
MOVE_AURORA_BEAM.description: The foe is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. It may also lower the target’s Attack stat.

MOVE_HYPER_BEAM.name: Hyper Beam
MOVE_HYPER_BEAM.description: The foe is attacked with a powerful beam. The user must rest on the next turn to regain its energy.

MOVE_PECK.name: Peck
MOVE_PECK.description: The foe is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

MOVE_DRILL_PECK.name: Drill Peck
MOVE_DRILL_PECK.description: A corkscrewing attack with the sharp beak acting as a drill.

MOVE_SUBMISSION.name: Submission
MOVE_SUBMISSION.description: The user grabs the foe and recklessly dives for the ground. It also hurts the user slightly.

MOVE_LOW_KICK.name: Low Kick
MOVE_LOW_KICK.description: A powerful low kick that makes the foe fall over. It inflicts greater damage on heavier foes.

MOVE_COUNTER.name: Counter
MOVE_COUNTER.description: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

MOVE_SEISMIC_TOSS.name: Seismic Toss
MOVE_SEISMIC_TOSS.description: The foe is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.

MOVE_STRENGTH.name: Strength
MOVE_STRENGTH.description: The foe is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power. It can also be used to move boulders.

MOVE_ABSORB.name: Absorb
MOVE_ABSORB.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

MOVE_MEGA_DRAIN.name: Mega Drain
MOVE_MEGA_DRAIN.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

MOVE_LEECH_SEED.name: Leech Seed
MOVE_LEECH_SEED.description: A seed is planted on the foe. It steals some HP from the foe to heal the user on every turn.

MOVE_GROWTH.name: Growth
MOVE_GROWTH.description: The user’s body is forced to grow all at once. It raises the Sp. Atk stat.

MOVE_RAZOR_LEAF.name: Razor Leaf
MOVE_RAZOR_LEAF.description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

MOVE_SOLAR_BEAM.name: Solar Beam
MOVE_SOLAR_BEAM.description: A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the second turn.

MOVE_POISON_POWDER.name: Poison Powder
MOVE_POISON_POWDER.description: A cloud of poisonous dust is scattered on the foe. It may poison the target.

MOVE_STUN_SPORE.name: Stun Spore
MOVE_STUN_SPORE.description: The user scatters a cloud of paralyzing powder. It may paralyze the target.

MOVE_SLEEP_POWDER.name: Sleep Powder
MOVE_SLEEP_POWDER.description: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep- inducing dust around the foe.

MOVE_PETAL_DANCE.name: Petal Dance
MOVE_PETAL_DANCE.description: The user attacks by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

MOVE_STRING_SHOT.name: String Shot
MOVE_STRING_SHOT.description: The foe is bound with silk blown from the user’s mouth. It reduces the target’s Speed stat.

MOVE_DRAGON_RAGE.name: Dragon Rage
MOVE_DRAGON_RAGE.description: The foe is stricken by a shock wave. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.

MOVE_FIRE_SPIN.name: Fire Vortex
MOVE_FIRE_SPIN.description: A blazing fire swirls around the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

MOVE_THUNDER_SHOCK.name: Thunder Shock
MOVE_THUNDER_SHOCK.description: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It may also leave the foe paralyzed.

MOVE_THUNDERBOLT.name: Thunderbolt
MOVE_THUNDERBOLT.description: A strong electric blast is loosed at the foe. It may also leave the foe paralyzed.

MOVE_THUNDER_WAVE.name: Thunder Wave
MOVE_THUNDER_WAVE.description: A weak electric charge is launched at the foe. It causes paralysis if it hits.

MOVE_THUNDER.name: Thunder
MOVE_THUNDER.description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the foe to inflict damage. It may also leave the target paralyzed.

MOVE_ROCK_THROW.name: Rock Throw
MOVE_ROCK_THROW.description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the foe to attack.

MOVE_EARTHQUAKE.name: Earthquake
MOVE_EARTHQUAKE.description: The user sets off an earthquake that hits all the Pokémon in the battle.

MOVE_FISSURE.name: EarthShatter
MOVE_FISSURE.description: The user rips open a crevice in the ground and drops the foe in. 33% recoil.

MOVE_DIG.name: Dig
MOVE_DIG.description: The user burrows, then attacks on the second turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.

MOVE_TOXIC.name: Toxic
MOVE_TOXIC.description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

MOVE_CONFUSION.name: Confusion
MOVE_CONFUSION.description: The foe is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the foe confused.

MOVE_PSYCHIC.name: Psychic
MOVE_PSYCHIC.description: The foe is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

MOVE_HYPNOSIS.name: Hypnosis
MOVE_HYPNOSIS.description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

MOVE_MEDITATE.name: Meditate
MOVE_MEDITATE.description: The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body and raise its Attack stat.

MOVE_AGILITY.name: Agility
MOVE_AGILITY.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

MOVE_QUICK_ATTACK.name: Quick Attack
MOVE_QUICK_ATTACK.description: The user lunges at the foe at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

MOVE_RAGE.name: Rage
MOVE_RAGE.description: While this move is in use, it gains attack power each time the user is hit in battle.

MOVE_TELEPORT.name: Teleport
MOVE_TELEPORT.description: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon. It can also warp to the last Pokémon Center visited.

MOVE_NIGHT_SHADE.name: Night Shade
MOVE_NIGHT_SHADE.description: The user makes the foe see a mirage. It inflicts damage matching the user’s level.

MOVE_MIMIC.name: Mimic
MOVE_MIMIC.description: The user copies the move last used by the foe. The move can be used for the rest of the battle.

MOVE_SCREECH.name: Screech
MOVE_SCREECH.description: An earsplitting screech is emitted to sharply reduce the foe’s Defense stat.

MOVE_DOUBLE_TEAM.name: Double Team
MOVE_DOUBLE_TEAM.description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

MOVE_RECOVER.name: Recover
MOVE_RECOVER.description: A self-healing move. The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

MOVE_HARDEN.name: Harden
MOVE_HARDEN.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

MOVE_MINIMIZE.name: Minimize
MOVE_MINIMIZE.description: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller. The user’s evasion stat is boosted.

MOVE_SMOKESCREEN.name: Smokescreen
MOVE_SMOKESCREEN.description: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. It reduces the foe’s accuracy.

MOVE_CONFUSE_RAY.name: Confuse Ray
MOVE_CONFUSE_RAY.description: The foe is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

MOVE_WITHDRAW.name: Withdraw
MOVE_WITHDRAW.description: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.

MOVE_DEFENSE_CURL.name: Defense Curl
MOVE_DEFENSE_CURL.description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

MOVE_BARRIER.name: Barrier
MOVE_BARRIER.description: The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat.

MOVE_LIGHT_SCREEN.name: Light Screen
MOVE_LIGHT_SCREEN.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from special attacks for five turns.

MOVE_HAZE.name: Haze
MOVE_HAZE.description: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

MOVE_REFLECT.name: Reflect
MOVE_REFLECT.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from physical attacks for five turns.

MOVE_FOCUS_ENERGY.name: Focus Energy
MOVE_FOCUS_ENERGY.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses to raise the critical-hit ratio of its attacks.

MOVE_BIDE.name: Bide
MOVE_BIDE.description: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

MOVE_METRONOME.name: Metronome
MOVE_METRONOME.description: The user waggles a finger and stimulates the brain into randomly using nearly any move.

MOVE_MIRROR_MOVE.name: Mirror Move
MOVE_MIRROR_MOVE.description: The user counters the foe by mimicking the move last used by the foe.

MOVE_SELF_DESTRUCT.name: Self-Destruct
MOVE_SELF_DESTRUCT.description: The user blows up to inflict damage on all Pokémon in battle. The user faints upon using this move.

MOVE_EGG_BOMB.name: Egg Bomb
MOVE_EGG_BOMB.description: A large egg is hurled with maximum force at the foe to inflict damage.

MOVE_LICK.name: Lick
MOVE_LICK.description: The foe is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. It may also paralyze the target.

MOVE_SMOG.name: Smog
MOVE_SMOG.description: The foe is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. It may also poison the target.

MOVE_SLUDGE.name: Sludge
MOVE_SLUDGE.description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the foe. It may also poison the target.

MOVE_BONE_CLUB.name: Bone Club
MOVE_BONE_CLUB.description: The user clubs the foe with a bone. It may also make the target flinch.

MOVE_FIRE_BLAST.name: Fire Blast
MOVE_FIRE_BLAST.description: The foe is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

MOVE_WATERFALL.name: Waterfall
MOVE_WATERFALL.description: The user charges at the foe rapidly, and may make it flinch. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.

MOVE_CLAMP.name: Clamp
MOVE_CLAMP.description: The foe is clamped and squeezed by the user’s very thick and sturdy shell for two to five turns.

MOVE_SWIFT.name: Swift
MOVE_SWIFT.description: Star-shaped rays are shot at the foe. This attack never misses.

MOVE_SKULL_BASH.name: Skull Bash
MOVE_SKULL_BASH.description: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense in the first turn, then rams the foe on the next turn.

MOVE_SPIKE_CANNON.name: Spike Cannon
MOVE_SPIKE_CANNON.description: Sharp spikes are fired at the foe to strike two to five times in rapid succession.

MOVE_CONSTRICT.name: Constrict
MOVE_CONSTRICT.description: The foe is attacked with long, creeping tentacles or vines. It may also lower the target’s Speed.

MOVE_AMNESIA.name: Amnesia
MOVE_AMNESIA.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. It sharply raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.

MOVE_KINESIS.name: Kinesis
MOVE_KINESIS.description: The user distracts the foe by bending a spoon. It may lower the target’s accuracy.

MOVE_SOFT_BOILED.name: Soft-Boiled
MOVE_SOFT_BOILED.description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP. It may also be used to heal an ally’s HP.

MOVE_HIGH_JUMP_KICK.name: High Jump Kick
MOVE_HIGH_JUMP_KICK.description: The foe is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

MOVE_GLARE.name: Glare
MOVE_GLARE.description: The user intimidates the foe with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

MOVE_DREAM_EATER.name: Dream Eater
MOVE_DREAM_EATER.description: An attack that works only on a sleeping foe. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user’s HP.

MOVE_POISON_GAS.name: Poison Gas
MOVE_POISON_GAS.description: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the foe’s face. It may poison the target.

MOVE_BARRAGE.name: Barrage
MOVE_BARRAGE.description: Round objects are hurled at the foe to strike two to five times in a row.

MOVE_LEECH_LIFE.name: Leech Life
MOVE_LEECH_LIFE.description: A blood-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

MOVE_LOVELY_KISS.name: Lovely Kiss
MOVE_LOVELY_KISS.description: With a scary face, the user tries to force a kiss on the foe. If it succeeds, the target falls asleep.

MOVE_SKY_ATTACK.name: Sky Attack
MOVE_SKY_ATTACK.description: A second-turn attack move with a high critical-hit ratio. It may also make the target flinch.

MOVE_TRANSFORM.name: Transform
MOVE_TRANSFORM.description: The user transforms into a copy of the foe right down to having the same move set.

MOVE_BUBBLE.name: Bubble
MOVE_BUBBLE.description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the foe. It may also lower the target’s Speed stat.

MOVE_DIZZY_PUNCH.name: Dizzy Punch
MOVE_DIZZY_PUNCH.description: The foe is hit with rhythmically launched punches that may also leave it confused.

MOVE_SPORE.name: Spore
MOVE_SPORE.description: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

MOVE_FLASH.name: Flash
MOVE_FLASH.description: The user flashes a light that cuts the foe’s accuracy. It can also be used to illuminate caves.

MOVE_PSYWAVE.name: Psywave
MOVE_PSYWAVE.description: The foe is attacked with an odd, hot energy wave. The attack varies in intensity.

MOVE_SPLASH.name: Splash
MOVE_SPLASH.description: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

MOVE_ACID_ARMOR.name: Acid Armor
MOVE_ACID_ARMOR.description: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.

MOVE_CRABHAMMER.name: Crabhammer
MOVE_CRABHAMMER.description: The foe is hammered with a large pincer. This move has a high critical-hit ratio.

MOVE_EXPLOSION.name: Explosion
MOVE_EXPLOSION.description: The user explodes to inflict damage on all Pokémon in battle. The user faints upon using this move.

MOVE_FURY_SWIPES.name: Fury Swipes
MOVE_FURY_SWIPES.description: The foe is raked with sharp claws or scythes for two to five times in quick succession.

MOVE_BONEMERANG.name: Bonemerang
MOVE_BONEMERANG.description: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops to hit the foe twice, coming and going.

MOVE_REST.name: Rest
MOVE_REST.description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. It fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status problem.

MOVE_ROCK_SLIDE.name: Rock Slide
MOVE_ROCK_SLIDE.description: Large boulders are hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It may also make the target flinch.

MOVE_HYPER_FANG.name: Hyper Fang
MOVE_HYPER_FANG.description: The user bites hard on the foe with its sharp front fangs. It may also make the target flinch.

MOVE_SHARPEN.name: Sharpen
MOVE_SHARPEN.description: The user reduces its polygon count to make itself more jagged, raising the Attack stat.

MOVE_CONVERSION.name: Conversion
MOVE_CONVERSION.description: The user changes its type to become the same type as one of its moves.

MOVE_TRI_ATTACK.name: Tri Attack
MOVE_TRI_ATTACK.description: The user strikes with a simultaneous three- beam attack. May also paralyze, burn, or freeze the target.

MOVE_SUPER_FANG.name: Super Fang
MOVE_SUPER_FANG.description: The user chomps hard on the foe with its sharp front fangs. It cuts the target’s HP to half.

MOVE_SLASH.name: Slash
MOVE_SLASH.description: The foe is attacked with a slash of claws, etc. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

MOVE_SUBSTITUTE.name: Substitute
MOVE_SUBSTITUTE.description: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.

MOVE_STRUGGLE.name: Struggle
MOVE_STRUGGLE.description: An attack that is used in desperation only if the user has no PP. It also hurts the user slightly.

MOVE_SKETCH.name: Sketch
MOVE_SKETCH.description: It enables the user to permanently learn the move last used by the foe. Once used, Sketch disappears.

MOVE_TRIPLE_KICK.name: Triple Kick
MOVE_TRIPLE_KICK.description: A consecutive three- kick attack that becomes more powerful with each  successive hit.

MOVE_THIEF.name: Thief
MOVE_THIEF.description: The user attacks and steals the foe’s held item simultaneously. It can’t steal if the user holds an item.

MOVE_SPIDER_WEB.name: Spider Web
MOVE_SPIDER_WEB.description: The user ensnares the foe with a thin, gooey silk so it can’t flee from battle.

MOVE_MIND_READER.name: Mind Reader
MOVE_MIND_READER.description: The user senses the foe’s movements with its mind to ensure its next attack does not miss.

MOVE_NIGHTMARE.name: Nightmare
MOVE_NIGHTMARE.description: A sleeping foe is shown a nightmare that inflicts some damage every turn.

MOVE_FLAME_WHEEL.name: Flame Wheel
MOVE_FLAME_WHEEL.description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the foe. It may also leave the target with a burn.

MOVE_SNORE.name: Snore
MOVE_SNORE.description: An attack that can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the foe flinch.

MOVE_CURSE.name: Curse
MOVE_CURSE.description: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all the other types.

MOVE_FLAIL.name: Flail
MOVE_FLAIL.description: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. It becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

MOVE_CONVERSION_2.name: Conversion 2
MOVE_CONVERSION_2.description: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the attack it last took.

MOVE_AEROBLAST.name: Aeroblast
MOVE_AEROBLAST.description: A vortex of air is shot at the foe to inflict damage. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

MOVE_COTTON_SPORE.name: Cotton Spore
MOVE_COTTON_SPORE.description: The user releases cottonlike spores that cling to the foe, sharply reducing its Speed stat.

MOVE_REVERSAL.name: Reversal
MOVE_REVERSAL.description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

MOVE_SPITE.name: Spite
MOVE_SPITE.description: The user looses its grudge on the move last used by the foe by cutting 4 PP from it.

MOVE_POWDER_SNOW.name: Powder Snow
MOVE_POWDER_SNOW.description: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. It may also freeze the target.

MOVE_PROTECT.name: Protect
MOVE_PROTECT.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

MOVE_MACH_PUNCH.name: Mach Punch
MOVE_MACH_PUNCH.description: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. It is certain to strike first.

MOVE_SCARY_FACE.name: Scary Face
MOVE_SCARY_FACE.description: The user frightens the foe with a scary face to sharply reduce its Speed stat.

MOVE_FEINT_ATTACK.name: Feint Attack
MOVE_FEINT_ATTACK.description: The user draws up to the foe disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.

MOVE_SWEET_KISS.name: Sweet Kiss
MOVE_SWEET_KISS.description: The user kisses the foe with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.

MOVE_BELLY_DRUM.name: Belly Drum
MOVE_BELLY_DRUM.description: The user maximizes its Attack stat in exchange for HP equal to half its max HP.

MOVE_SLUDGE_BOMB.name: Sludge Bomb
MOVE_SLUDGE_BOMB.description: The user attacks by hurling filthy sludge at the foe. It may also poison the target.

MOVE_MUD_SLAP.name: Mud-Slap
MOVE_MUD_SLAP.description: The user hurls mud in the foe’s face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

MOVE_OCTAZOOKA.name: Octazooka
MOVE_OCTAZOOKA.description: The user attacks by spraying ink in the foe’s face or eyes. It may also lower the target’s accuracy.

MOVE_SPIKES.name: Spikes
MOVE_SPIKES.description: The user lays a trap of spikes at the foe’s feet. The trap hurts foes that switch into battle.

MOVE_ZAP_CANNON.name: Zap Cannon
MOVE_ZAP_CANNON.description: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.

MOVE_FORESIGHT.name: Foresight
MOVE_FORESIGHT.description: Enables the user to hit a Ghost type with any type of move. It also enables the user to hit an evasive foe.

MOVE_DESTINY_BOND.name: Destiny Bond
MOVE_DESTINY_BOND.description: When this move is used, if the user faints, the foe that landed the knockout hit also faints.

MOVE_PERISH_SONG.name: Perish Song
MOVE_PERISH_SONG.description: Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out of battle.

MOVE_ICY_WIND.name: Icy Wind
MOVE_ICY_WIND.description: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. It also lowers the target’s Speed stat.

MOVE_DETECT.name: Detect
MOVE_DETECT.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

MOVE_BONE_RUSH.name: Bone Rush
MOVE_BONE_RUSH.description: The user strikes at the foe with a hard bone two to five times in a row.

MOVE_LOCK_ON.name: Lock-On
MOVE_LOCK_ON.description: The user takes sure aim at the foe. It ensures the next attack does not fail to hit the target.

MOVE_OUTRAGE.name: Supernova
MOVE_OUTRAGE.description: The user bursts with a blaze of glory. 30% chance to burn targets. 33% recoil.

MOVE_SANDSTORM.name: Sandstorm
MOVE_SANDSTORM.description: A five-turn sand- storm is summoned to hurt all combatant types except Rock,  Ground, and Steel.

MOVE_GIGA_DRAIN.name: Giga Drain
MOVE_GIGA_DRAIN.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

MOVE_ENDURE.name: Endure
MOVE_ENDURE.description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

MOVE_CHARM.name: Charm
MOVE_CHARM.description: The user charmingly stares at the foe, making it less wary. The target’s Attack is sharply lowered.

MOVE_ROLLOUT.name: Rollout
MOVE_ROLLOUT.description: The user continually rolls into the foe over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

MOVE_FALSE_SWIPE.name: False Swipe
MOVE_FALSE_SWIPE.description: A restrained attack that prevents the foe from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

MOVE_SWAGGER.name: Swagger
MOVE_SWAGGER.description: The user enrages the foe into confusion. However, it also sharply raises the foe’s Attack stat.

MOVE_MILK_DRINK.name: Milk Drink
MOVE_MILK_DRINK.description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP. It may also be used to heal an ally’s HP.

MOVE_SPARK.name: Spark
MOVE_SPARK.description: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the foe. It may also leave the target paralyzed.

MOVE_FURY_CUTTER.name: Fury Cutter
MOVE_FURY_CUTTER.description: The foe is slashed with scythes or claws. Its power increases if it hits in succession.

MOVE_STEEL_WING.name: Steel Wing
MOVE_STEEL_WING.description: The foe is hit with wings of steel. It may also raise the user’s Defense stat.

MOVE_MEAN_LOOK.name: Mean Look
MOVE_MEAN_LOOK.description: The user affixes the foe with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

MOVE_ATTRACT.name: Attract
MOVE_ATTRACT.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

MOVE_SLEEP_TALK.name: Sleep Talk
MOVE_SLEEP_TALK.description: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.

MOVE_HEAL_BELL.name: Heal Bell
MOVE_HEAL_BELL.description: The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status problems of all the party Pokémon.

MOVE_RETURN.name: Return
MOVE_RETURN.description: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the more the user likes its Trainer.

MOVE_PRESENT.name: Present
MOVE_PRESENT.description: The user attacks by giving the foe a booby-trapped gift. It restores HP sometimes, however.

MOVE_FRUSTRATION.name: Frustration
MOVE_FRUSTRATION.description: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.

MOVE_SAFEGUARD.name: Safeguard
MOVE_SAFEGUARD.description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status problems for five turns.

MOVE_PAIN_SPLIT.name: Pain Split
MOVE_PAIN_SPLIT.description: The user adds its HP to the foe’s HP, then equally shares the combined HP with the foe.

MOVE_SACRED_FIRE.name: Sacred Fire
MOVE_SACRED_FIRE.description: The foe is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. It may also leave the target with a burn.

MOVE_MAGNITUDE.name: Magnitude
MOVE_MAGNITUDE.description: The user looses a ground-shaking quake affecting everyone in battle. Its power varies.

MOVE_DYNAMIC_PUNCH.name: Dynamic Punch
MOVE_DYNAMIC_PUNCH.description: The foe is punched with the user’s full, concentrated power. It confuses the foe if it hits.

MOVE_MEGAHORN.name: Megahorn
MOVE_MEGAHORN.description: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the foe  with no letup.

MOVE_DRAGON_BREATH.name: Dragon Breath
MOVE_DRAGON_BREATH.description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. It may also paralyze the target.

MOVE_BATON_PASS.name: Baton Pass
MOVE_BATON_PASS.description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, passing along any stat changes.

MOVE_ENCORE.name: Encore
MOVE_ENCORE.description: The user compels the foe to keep using only the move it last used for three to seven turns.

MOVE_PURSUIT.name: Pursuit
MOVE_PURSUIT.description: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a foe that is switching out of battle.

MOVE_RAPID_SPIN.name: Rapid Spin
MOVE_RAPID_SPIN.description: A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as Bind, Wrap, Leech Seed, and Spikes.

MOVE_SWEET_SCENT.name: Fairy Breeze
MOVE_SWEET_SCENT.description: A sweet wind blows the foes away. That’s about it.

MOVE_IRON_TAIL.name: Iron Tail
MOVE_IRON_TAIL.description: The foe is slammed with a steel-hard tail. It may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

MOVE_METAL_CLAW.name: Metal Claw
MOVE_METAL_CLAW.description: The foe is raked with steel claws. It may also raise the user’s Attack stat.

MOVE_VITAL_THROW.name: Vital Throw
MOVE_VITAL_THROW.description: The user allows the foe to attack first. In return, this throw move is guaranteed not to miss.

MOVE_MORNING_SUN.name: Morning Sun
MOVE_MORNING_SUN.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

MOVE_SYNTHESIS.name: Synthesis
MOVE_SYNTHESIS.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

MOVE_MOONLIGHT.name: Moonlight
MOVE_MOONLIGHT.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

MOVE_HIDDEN_POWER.name: Hidden Power
MOVE_HIDDEN_POWER.description: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the Pokémon using it.

MOVE_CROSS_CHOP.name: Cross Chop
MOVE_CROSS_CHOP.description: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

MOVE_TWISTER.name: Twister
MOVE_TWISTER.description: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the foe. It may also make the foe flinch.

MOVE_RAIN_DANCE.name: Rain Dance
MOVE_RAIN_DANCE.description: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water- type moves.

MOVE_SUNNY_DAY.name: Sunny Day
MOVE_SUNNY_DAY.description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves.

MOVE_CRUNCH.name: Crunch
MOVE_CRUNCH.description: The user crunches up the foe with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

MOVE_MIRROR_COAT.name: Mirror Coat
MOVE_MIRROR_COAT.description: A retaliation move that counters any special attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

MOVE_PSYCH_UP.name: Psych Up
MOVE_PSYCH_UP.description: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the foe.

MOVE_EXTREME_SPEED.name: Extreme Speed
MOVE_EXTREME_SPEED.description: The user charges the foe at blinding speed. This attack always goes before any other move.

MOVE_ANCIENT_POWER.name: Ancient Power
MOVE_ANCIENT_POWER.description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. It may also raise all the user’s stats at once.

MOVE_SHADOW_BALL.name: Shadow Ball
MOVE_SHADOW_BALL.description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the foe. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

MOVE_FUTURE_SIGHT.name: Future Sight
MOVE_FUTURE_SIGHT.description: Two turns after this move is used, the foe is attacked with a hunk of psychic energy.

MOVE_ROCK_SMASH.name: Rock Smash
MOVE_ROCK_SMASH.description: The user hits with a punch that may lower the target’s Defense. It can also smash cracked boulders.

MOVE_WHIRLPOOL.name: Aqua Vortex
MOVE_WHIRLPOOL.description: A harsh whirlpool swirls around the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

MOVE_BEAT_UP.name: Beat Up
MOVE_BEAT_UP.description: The user gets all the party Pokémon to attack the foe. The more party Pokémon, the more damage.

MOVE_FAKE_OUT.name: Fake Out
MOVE_FAKE_OUT.description: An attack that hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.

MOVE_UPROAR.name: Uproar
MOVE_UPROAR.description: The user attacks in an uproar for two to five turns. Over that time, no one can fall asleep.

MOVE_STOCKPILE.name: Stockpile
MOVE_STOCKPILE.description: The user charges up power, and raises both its Defense and Sp. Def. The move can be used three times.

MOVE_SPIT_UP.name: Spit Up
MOVE_SPIT_UP.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is released at once in an attack.

MOVE_SWALLOW.name: Swallow
MOVE_SWALLOW.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to heal its HP.

MOVE_HEAT_WAVE.name: Heat Wave
MOVE_HEAT_WAVE.description: The user exhales a heated breath on the foe to attack. It may also leave the target with a burn.

MOVE_HAIL.name: Hail
MOVE_HAIL.description: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokémon except the Ice type.

MOVE_TORMENT.name: Torment
MOVE_TORMENT.description: The user torments and enrages the foe, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

MOVE_FLATTER.name: Flatter
MOVE_FLATTER.description: Flattery is used to confuse the foe. However, it also raises the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

MOVE_WILL_O_WISP.name: Will-O-Wisp
MOVE_WILL_O_WISP.description: The user shoots a sinister, bluish white flame at the foe to inflict a burn.

MOVE_MEMENTO.name: Shadow Shift
MOVE_MEMENTO.description: The user terrorizes the foe with the power of shadows. 30% odds to lower Sp. Atk. ...spooky...

MOVE_FACADE.name: Facade
MOVE_FACADE.description: An attack move that doubles its power if the user is poisoned, paralyzed, or has a burn.

MOVE_FOCUS_PUNCH.name: Focus Punch
MOVE_FOCUS_PUNCH.description: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. It will fail if the user is hit before it is used.

MOVE_SMELLING_SALTS.name: Smelling Salts
MOVE_SMELLING_SALTS.description: This attack inflicts double damage on a paralyzed foe. It also cures the foe’s paralysis, however.

MOVE_FOLLOW_ME.name: Follow Me
MOVE_FOLLOW_ME.description: The user draws attention to itself, making all foes take aim only at the user.

MOVE_NATURE_POWER.name: Nature Power
MOVE_NATURE_POWER.description: An attack that makes use of nature’s power. Its effects vary depending on the user’s environment.

MOVE_CHARGE.name: Charge
MOVE_CHARGE.description: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses next. It also raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.

MOVE_TAUNT.name: Taunt
MOVE_TAUNT.description: The foe is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for two to four turns.

MOVE_HELPING_HAND.name: Helping Hand
MOVE_HELPING_HAND.description: A move that boosts the power of the ally’s attack in a Double Battle.

MOVE_TRICK.name: Trick
MOVE_TRICK.description: The user catches the foe off guard and swaps the foe’s held item with its own.

MOVE_ROLE_PLAY.name: Role Play
MOVE_ROLE_PLAY.description: The user mimics the foe completely, copying the foe’s natural ability.

MOVE_WISH.name: Wish
MOVE_WISH.description: A self-healing move. The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP in the next turn.

MOVE_ASSIST.name: Assist
MOVE_ASSIST.description: The user hurriedly and randomly uses a move among those known by other Pokémon in the party.

MOVE_INGRAIN.name: Ingrain
MOVE_INGRAIN.description: The user lays roots that restore HP on every turn. Because it is rooted, it can’t switch out.

MOVE_SUPERPOWER.name: Superpower
MOVE_SUPERPOWER.description: The user attacks the foe with great power. However, it also lowers the user’s Attack and Defense.

MOVE_MAGIC_COAT.name: Magic Coat
MOVE_MAGIC_COAT.description: A barrier reflects back to the foe moves like Leech Seed and moves that damage status.

MOVE_RECYCLE.name: Recycle
MOVE_RECYCLE.description: The user recycles a held item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.

MOVE_REVENGE.name: Revenge
MOVE_REVENGE.description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the foe in the same turn.

MOVE_BRICK_BREAK.name: Brick Break
MOVE_BRICK_BREAK.description: The user attacks with tough fists, etc. It can also break any barrier such as Light Screen and Reflect.

MOVE_YAWN.name: Yawn
MOVE_YAWN.description: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the foe into falling asleep on the next turn.

MOVE_KNOCK_OFF.name: Knock Off
MOVE_KNOCK_OFF.description: The user slaps down the foe’s held item, preventing the item from being used during the battle.

MOVE_ENDEAVOR.name: Endeavor
MOVE_ENDEAVOR.description: An attack move that cuts down the foe’s HP to equal the user’s HP.

MOVE_ERUPTION.name: Eruption
MOVE_ERUPTION.description: The user attacks in an explosive fury. The lower the user’s HP, the less powerful this attack becomes.

MOVE_SKILL_SWAP.name: Skill Swap
MOVE_SKILL_SWAP.description: The user employs its psychic power to exchange abilities with the foe.

MOVE_IMPRISON.name: Imprison
MOVE_IMPRISON.description: If the foe knows any move also known by the user, the foe is prevented from using it.

MOVE_REFRESH.name: Refresh
MOVE_REFRESH.description: The user rests to cure itself of a poisoning, burn, or paralysis.

MOVE_GRUDGE.name: Grudge
MOVE_GRUDGE.description: If the user faints, the user’s grudge fully depletes the PP of the foe’s move that knocked it out.

MOVE_SNATCH.name: Snatch
MOVE_SNATCH.description: The user steals the effects of any healing or stat- changing move the foe attempts to use.

MOVE_SECRET_POWER.name: Secret Power
MOVE_SECRET_POWER.description: The user attacks with a secret power. Its added effects vary depending on the user’s environment.

MOVE_DIVE.name: Dive
MOVE_DIVE.description: A two-turn attack. The user dives underwater on the first turn, then hits on the next turn.

MOVE_ARM_THRUST.name: Arm Thrust
MOVE_ARM_THRUST.description: The user looses a flurry of open-palmed arm thrusts that hit two to five times in a row.

MOVE_CAMOUFLAGE.name: Camouflage
MOVE_CAMOUFLAGE.description: The user’s type is changed depending on its environment, such as at water’s edge, in grass, or in a cave.

MOVE_TAIL_GLOW.name: Tail Glow
MOVE_TAIL_GLOW.description: The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind, sharply raising its Sp. Atk stat.

MOVE_LUSTER_PURGE.name: Luster Purge
MOVE_LUSTER_PURGE.description: The user looses a damaging burst of light. It may also reduce the target’s Sp. Def stat.

MOVE_MIST_BALL.name: Mist Ball
MOVE_MIST_BALL.description: A mistlike flurry of down envelops and damages the foe. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk.

MOVE_FEATHER_DANCE.name: Feather Dance
MOVE_FEATHER_DANCE.description: The user covers the foe with a mass of down that sharply lowers the Attack stat.

MOVE_TEETER_DANCE.name: Teeter Dance
MOVE_TEETER_DANCE.description: The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses all the Pokémon in battle.

MOVE_BLAZE_KICK.name: Blaze Kick
MOVE_BLAZE_KICK.description: The user launches a kick with a high critical-hit ratio. It may also leave the target with a burn.

MOVE_MUD_SPORT.name: Mud Sport
MOVE_MUD_SPORT.description: The user covers itself with mud. It weakens Electric- type moves while the user is in the battle.

MOVE_ICE_BALL.name: Ice Ball
MOVE_ICE_BALL.description: The user continually rolls into the foe over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

MOVE_NEEDLE_ARM.name: Needle Arm
MOVE_NEEDLE_ARM.description: The user attacks by wildly swinging its thorny arms. It may also make the target flinch.

MOVE_SLACK_OFF.name: Slack Off
MOVE_SLACK_OFF.description: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP.

MOVE_HYPER_VOICE.name: Hyper Voice
MOVE_HYPER_VOICE.description: The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.

MOVE_POISON_FANG.name: Poison Fang
MOVE_POISON_FANG.description: The user bites the foe with toxic fangs. It may also leave the foe badly poisoned.

MOVE_CRUSH_CLAW.name: Crush Claw
MOVE_CRUSH_CLAW.description: The user slashes the foe with hard and sharp claws. It may also lower the target’s Defense.

MOVE_BLAST_BURN.name: Blast Burn
MOVE_BLAST_BURN.description: The foe is razed by a fiery explosion. The user must rest on the next turn, however.

MOVE_HYDRO_CANNON.name: Hydro Cannon
MOVE_HYDRO_CANNON.description: The foe is hit with a watery blast. The user must rest on the next turn, however.

MOVE_METEOR_MASH.name: Meteor Mash
MOVE_METEOR_MASH.description: The foe is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. It may also raise the user’s Attack.

MOVE_ASTONISH.name: Astonish
MOVE_ASTONISH.description: The user attacks the foe while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.

MOVE_WEATHER_BALL.name: Weather Ball
MOVE_WEATHER_BALL.description: An attack move that varies in power and type depending on the weather.

MOVE_AROMATHERAPY.name: Aromatherapy
MOVE_AROMATHERAPY.description: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status problems affecting the user’s party.

MOVE_FAKE_TEARS.name: Fake Tears
MOVE_FAKE_TEARS.description: The user feigns crying to make the foe feel flustered, sharply lowering its Sp. Def stat.

MOVE_AIR_CUTTER.name: Air Cutter
MOVE_AIR_CUTTER.description: The user launches razorlike wind to slash the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

MOVE_OVERHEAT.name: Overheat
MOVE_OVERHEAT.description: The user attacks the foe at full power. The attack’s recoil sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

MOVE_ODOR_SLEUTH.name: Quiver Crawl
MOVE_ODOR_SLEUTH.description: The user rapidly wiggles to hit the foe. Probably scares small children, too. 30% odds to raise Def.

MOVE_ROCK_TOMB.name: Rock Tomb
MOVE_ROCK_TOMB.description: Boulders are hurled at the foe. It also lowers the foe’s Speed by preventing its movement.

MOVE_SILVER_WIND.name: Silver Wind
MOVE_SILVER_WIND.description: The foe is attacked with powdery scales blown by wind. It may also raise all the user’s stats.

MOVE_METAL_SOUND.name: Metal Sound
MOVE_METAL_SOUND.description: A horrible sound like scraping metal is emitted to sharply reduce the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

MOVE_GRASS_WHISTLE.name: Grass Whistle
MOVE_GRASS_WHISTLE.description: The user plays a pleasant melody that lulls the foe into a deep sleep.

MOVE_TICKLE.name: Tickle
MOVE_TICKLE.description: The user tickles the foe into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.

MOVE_COSMIC_POWER.name: Cosmic Power
MOVE_COSMIC_POWER.description: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

MOVE_WATER_SPOUT.name: Water Spout
MOVE_WATER_SPOUT.description: The user spouts water to damage the foe. The lower the user’s HP, the less powerful it becomes.

MOVE_SIGNAL_BEAM.name: Signal Beam
MOVE_SIGNAL_BEAM.description: The user attacks with a sinister beam of light. It may also confuse the target.

MOVE_SHADOW_PUNCH.name: Shadow Punch
MOVE_SHADOW_PUNCH.description: The user throws a punch at the foe from the shadows. The punch lands without fail.

MOVE_EXTRASENSORY.name: Extrasensory
MOVE_EXTRASENSORY.description: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power. It may also make the foe flinch.

MOVE_SKY_UPPERCUT.name: Sky Uppercut
MOVE_SKY_UPPERCUT.description: The user attacks the foe with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.

MOVE_SAND_TOMB.name: Sand Vortex
MOVE_SAND_TOMB.description: A harsh sandstorm swirls around the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

MOVE_SHEER_COLD.name: Permafrost
MOVE_SHEER_COLD.description: The foe is attacked with a blast of absolute-zero cold. The foe is likely to be frozen.

MOVE_MUDDY_WATER.name: Muddy Water
MOVE_MUDDY_WATER.description: The user attacks by shooting out muddy water. It may also lower the foe’s accuracy.

MOVE_BULLET_SEED.name: Bullet Seed
MOVE_BULLET_SEED.description: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the foe. Two to five seeds are shot in rapid succession.

MOVE_AERIAL_ACE.name: Aerial Ace
MOVE_AERIAL_ACE.description: The user confounds the foe with speed, then slashes. The attack lands without fail.

MOVE_ICICLE_SPEAR.name: Icicle Spear
MOVE_ICICLE_SPEAR.description: The user launches sharp icicles at the foe. It strikes two to five times in a row.

MOVE_IRON_DEFENSE.name: Iron Defense
MOVE_IRON_DEFENSE.description: The user hardens its body’s surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

MOVE_BLOCK.name: Block
MOVE_BLOCK.description: The user blocks the foe’s way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.

MOVE_HOWL.name: Howl
MOVE_HOWL.description: The user howls loudly to raise its spirit, boosting its Attack stat.

MOVE_DRAGON_CLAW.name: Dragon Claw
MOVE_DRAGON_CLAW.description: The user slashes the foe with huge, sharp claws.

MOVE_FRENZY_PLANT.name: Frenzy Plant
MOVE_FRENZY_PLANT.description: The foe is slammed with an enormous tree. The user can’t move on the next turn.

MOVE_BULK_UP.name: Bulk Up
MOVE_BULK_UP.description: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, boosting both its Attack and Defense stats.

MOVE_BOUNCE.name: Bounce
MOVE_BOUNCE.description: The user bounces up high, then drops on the foe on the second turn. It may also paralyze the foe.

MOVE_MUD_SHOT.name: Mud Shot
MOVE_MUD_SHOT.description: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the foe. It also reduces the target’s Speed.

MOVE_POISON_TAIL.name: Poison Tail
MOVE_POISON_TAIL.description: An attack with a high critical-hit ratio. This tail  attack may also  poison the foe.

MOVE_COVET.name: Covet
MOVE_COVET.description: The user endearingly approaches the foe, then steals the item the foe is holding.

MOVE_VOLT_TACKLE.name: Volt Tackle
MOVE_VOLT_TACKLE.description: The user electrifies itself, then charges at the foe. It causes considerable damage to the user as well.

MOVE_MAGICAL_LEAF.name: Magical Leaf
MOVE_MAGICAL_LEAF.description: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the foe. This attack will not miss.

MOVE_WATER_SPORT.name: Water Sport
MOVE_WATER_SPORT.description: The user soaks itself with water. The move weakens Fire-type moves while the user is in the battle.

MOVE_CALM_MIND.name: Calm Mind
MOVE_CALM_MIND.description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

MOVE_LEAF_BLADE.name: Leaf Blade
MOVE_LEAF_BLADE.description: The foe is slashed with a sharp leaf. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

MOVE_DRAGON_DANCE.name: Dragon Dance
MOVE_DRAGON_DANCE.description: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that boosts its Attack and Speed stats.

MOVE_ROCK_BLAST.name: Rock Blast
MOVE_ROCK_BLAST.description: The user hurls hard rocks at the foe. Two to five rocks are launched in quick succession.

MOVE_SHOCK_WAVE.name: Shock Wave
MOVE_SHOCK_WAVE.description: The user strikes the foe with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack cannot be evaded.

MOVE_WATER_PULSE.name: Water Pulse
MOVE_WATER_PULSE.description: The user attacks the foe with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the foe.

MOVE_DOOM_DESIRE.name: Doom Desire
MOVE_DOOM_DESIRE.description: Two turns after this move is used, the user blasts the foe with a concentrated bundle of light.

MOVE_PSYCHO_BOOST.name: Psycho Boost
MOVE_PSYCHO_BOOST.description: The user attacks the foe at full power. The attack’s recoil sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

MOVE_ROOST.name: Roost
MOVE_ROOST.description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user’s HP by up to half of its max HP.

MOVE_GRAVITY.name: Black Hole
MOVE_GRAVITY.description: Using cosmic energy, the user drags all other Pokemon to the ground, lowering Speed.

MOVE_MIRACLE_EYE.name: Miracle Eye
MOVE_MIRACLE_EYE.description: Enables the user to hit a Dark type with any type of move. It also enables the user to hit an evasive foe.

MOVE_WAKE_UP_SLAP.name: Wake-Up Slap
MOVE_WAKE_UP_SLAP.description: This attack inflicts high damage on a sleeping foe. It also wakes the foe up, however.

MOVE_HAMMER_ARM.name: Hammer Arm
MOVE_HAMMER_ARM.description: The user swings and hits with its strong and heavy fist. It lowers the user’s Speed, however.

MOVE_GYRO_BALL.name: Gyro Ball
MOVE_GYRO_BALL.description: The user tackles the foe with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.

MOVE_HEALING_WISH.name: Healing Wish
MOVE_HEALING_WISH.description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status cured.

MOVE_BRINE.name: Brine
MOVE_BRINE.description: If the foe’s HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power.

MOVE_NATURAL_GIFT.name: Natural Gift
MOVE_NATURAL_GIFT.description: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines its type and power.

MOVE_FEINT.name: Swift Strike
MOVE_FEINT.description: The fastest attack known to Pokemon. Hits with +3 priority!

MOVE_PLUCK.name: Pluck
MOVE_PLUCK.description: The user pecks the foe. If the foe is holding a Berry, the user plucks it and gains its effect.

MOVE_TAILWIND.name: Tailwind
MOVE_TAILWIND.description: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed of all party Pokémon for three turns.

MOVE_ACUPRESSURE.name: Acupressure
MOVE_ACUPRESSURE.description: The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its stats.

MOVE_METAL_BURST.name: Metal Burst
MOVE_METAL_BURST.description: The user retaliates against the foe that last inflicted damage on it with much greater power.

MOVE_U_TURN.name: U-turn
MOVE_U_TURN.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

MOVE_CLOSE_COMBAT.name: Close Combat
MOVE_CLOSE_COMBAT.description: The user fights the foe up close without guarding itself. It also cuts the user’s Defense and Sp. Def.

MOVE_PAYBACK.name: Payback
MOVE_PAYBACK.description: If the user can use this attack after the foe attacks, its power is doubled.

MOVE_ASSURANCE.name: Assurance
MOVE_ASSURANCE.description: If the foe has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack’s power is doubled.

MOVE_EMBARGO.name: Taxation
MOVE_EMBARGO.description: The user guzzles the foe’s bank account dry, restoring 50% damage done. LIBERTY BABY!

MOVE_FLING.name: Fling
MOVE_FLING.description: The user flings its held item at the foe to attack. Its power and effects depend on the item.

MOVE_PSYCHO_SHIFT.name: Psycho Shift
MOVE_PSYCHO_SHIFT.description: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status problems to the target.

MOVE_TRUMP_CARD.name: Trump Card
MOVE_TRUMP_CARD.description: The fewer PP this move has, the more power it has for attack.

MOVE_HEAL_BLOCK.name: Heal Block
MOVE_HEAL_BLOCK.description: The user prevents the foe from using any HP-recovery moves for five turns.

MOVE_WRING_OUT.name: Wring Out
MOVE_WRING_OUT.description: The user powerfully wrings the foe. The more HP the foe has, the greater this attack’s power.

MOVE_POWER_TRICK.name: Power Trick
MOVE_POWER_TRICK.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack with its Defense stat.

MOVE_GASTRO_ACID.name: Gastro Acid
MOVE_GASTRO_ACID.description: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the foe. The fluid eliminates the effect of the foe’s ability.

MOVE_LUCKY_CHANT.name: Lucky Chant
MOVE_LUCKY_CHANT.description: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing the foe from landing critical hits.

MOVE_ME_FIRST.name: Me First
MOVE_ME_FIRST.description: The user tries to cut ahead of the foe to steal and use the foe’s intended move with greater power.

MOVE_COPYCAT.name: Copycat
MOVE_COPYCAT.description: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.

MOVE_POWER_SWAP.name: Power Swap
MOVE_POWER_SWAP.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk with the foe.

MOVE_GUARD_SWAP.name: Guard Swap
MOVE_GUARD_SWAP.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def with the foe.

MOVE_PUNISHMENT.name: Punishment
MOVE_PUNISHMENT.description: This attack’s power increases the more the foe has powered up with stat changes.

MOVE_LAST_RESORT.name: Star Prayer
MOVE_LAST_RESORT.description: In desperation, the user makes a prayer to the heavens. May omniboost user’s stats.

MOVE_WORRY_SEED.name: Worry Seed
MOVE_WORRY_SEED.description: A seed that causes worry is planted on the foe. It prevents sleep by making its ability Insomnia.

MOVE_SUCKER_PUNCH.name: Sucker Punch
MOVE_SUCKER_PUNCH.description: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the foe is not readying an attack, however.

MOVE_TOXIC_SPIKES.name: Toxic Spikes
MOVE_TOXIC_SPIKES.description: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the foe’s feet. They poison foes that switch into battle.

MOVE_HEART_SWAP.name: Heart Swap
MOVE_HEART_SWAP.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch stat changes with the foe.

MOVE_AQUA_RING.name: Aqua Ring
MOVE_AQUA_RING.description: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP on every turn.

MOVE_MAGNET_RISE.name: Magnet Rise
MOVE_MAGNET_RISE.description: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

MOVE_FLARE_BLITZ.name: Flare Blitz
MOVE_FLARE_BLITZ.description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the foe. The user sustains serious damage, too.

MOVE_FORCE_PALM.name: Force Palm
MOVE_FORCE_PALM.description: The foe is attacked with a shock wave. It may also leave the target paralyzed.

MOVE_AURA_SPHERE.name: Aura Sphere
MOVE_AURA_SPHERE.description: The user looses a blast of aura power from deep within its body. This move is certain to hit.

MOVE_ROCK_POLISH.name: Rock Polish
MOVE_ROCK_POLISH.description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. It can sharply raise the Speed stat.

MOVE_POISON_JAB.name: Poison Jab
MOVE_POISON_JAB.description: The foe is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. It may also poison the foe.

MOVE_DARK_PULSE.name: Dark Pulse
MOVE_DARK_PULSE.description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target flinch.

MOVE_NIGHT_SLASH.name: Night Slash
MOVE_NIGHT_SLASH.description: The user slashes the foe the instant an opportunity arises. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

MOVE_AQUA_TAIL.name: Aqua Tail
MOVE_AQUA_TAIL.description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

MOVE_SEED_BOMB.name: Seed Bomb
MOVE_SEED_BOMB.description: The user slams a barrage of hard- shelled seeds down on the foe from above.

MOVE_AIR_SLASH.name: Air Slash
MOVE_AIR_SLASH.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target flinch.

MOVE_X_SCISSOR.name: X-Scissor
MOVE_X_SCISSOR.description: The user slashes at the foe by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

MOVE_BUG_BUZZ.name: Bug Buzz
MOVE_BUG_BUZZ.description: The user vibrates its wings to generate a damaging sound wave. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

MOVE_DRAGON_PULSE.name: Dragon Pulse
MOVE_DRAGON_PULSE.description: The foe is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user’s gaping mouth.

MOVE_DRAGON_RUSH.name: Dragon Rush
MOVE_DRAGON_RUSH.description: The user tackles the foe while exhibiting overwhelming menace. It may also make the target flinch.

MOVE_POWER_GEM.name: Power Gem
MOVE_POWER_GEM.description: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

MOVE_DRAIN_PUNCH.name: Drain Punch
MOVE_DRAIN_PUNCH.description: An energy-draining punch. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

MOVE_VACUUM_WAVE.name: Vacuum Wave
MOVE_VACUUM_WAVE.description: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the foe. This move always goes first.

MOVE_FOCUS_BLAST.name: Focus Blast
MOVE_FOCUS_BLAST.description: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

MOVE_ENERGY_BALL.name: Energy Ball
MOVE_ENERGY_BALL.description: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the foe. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

MOVE_BRAVE_BIRD.name: Brave Bird
MOVE_BRAVE_BIRD.description: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. The user also takes serious damage.

MOVE_EARTH_POWER.name: Earth Power
MOVE_EARTH_POWER.description: The user makes the ground under the foe erupt with power. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

MOVE_SWITCHEROO.name: Switcheroo
MOVE_SWITCHEROO.description: The user trades held items with the foe faster than the eye can follow.

MOVE_GIGA_IMPACT.name: Giga Impact
MOVE_GIGA_IMPACT.description: The user charges at the foe using every bit of its power. The user must rest on the next turn.

MOVE_NASTY_PLOT.name: Nasty Plot
MOVE_NASTY_PLOT.description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. It sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk.

MOVE_BULLET_PUNCH.name: Bullet Punch
MOVE_BULLET_PUNCH.description: The user strikes with a tough punch as fast as a bullet. This move always goes first.

MOVE_AVALANCHE.name: Avalanche
MOVE_AVALANCHE.description: Large ice hunks are hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It may also make the target flinch.

MOVE_ICE_SHARD.name: Ice Shard
MOVE_ICE_SHARD.description: The user flash freezes chunks of ice and hurls them. This move always goes first.

MOVE_SHADOW_CLAW.name: Shadow Claw
MOVE_SHADOW_CLAW.description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

MOVE_THUNDER_FANG.name: Thunder Fang
MOVE_THUNDER_FANG.description: The user bites with electrified fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or become paralyzed.

MOVE_ICE_FANG.name: Ice Fang
MOVE_ICE_FANG.description: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or freeze.

MOVE_FIRE_FANG.name: Fire Fang
MOVE_FIRE_FANG.description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or sustain a burn.

MOVE_SHADOW_SNEAK.name: Shadow Sneak
MOVE_SHADOW_SNEAK.description: The user extends its shadow and attacks the foe from behind. This move always goes first.

MOVE_MUD_BOMB.name: Mud Bomb
MOVE_MUD_BOMB.description: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. It may also lower the target’s accuracy.

MOVE_PSYCHO_CUT.name: Psycho Cut
MOVE_PSYCHO_CUT.description: The user tears at the foe with blades formed by psychic power. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

MOVE_ZEN_HEADBUTT.name: Zen Headbutt
MOVE_ZEN_HEADBUTT.description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and rams the foe. It may also make the target flinch.

MOVE_MIRROR_SHOT.name: Mirror Shot
MOVE_MIRROR_SHOT.description: The user looses a flash of energy from its polished body. It may also lower the target’s accuracy.

MOVE_FLASH_CANNON.name: Flash Cannon
MOVE_FLASH_CANNON.description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

MOVE_ROCK_CLIMB.name: Rock Climb
MOVE_ROCK_CLIMB.description: A charging attack that may also leave the foe confused. It can also be used to scale rocky walls.

MOVE_DEFOG.name: Defog
MOVE_DEFOG.description: It reduces the foe’s evasion stat. It also removes spikes, light screens, etc.

MOVE_TRICK_ROOM.name: Trick Room
MOVE_TRICK_ROOM.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

MOVE_DRACO_METEOR.name: Draco Meteor
MOVE_DRACO_METEOR.description: Comets are summoned down from the sky. The attack’s recoil sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

MOVE_DISCHARGE.name: Discharge
MOVE_DISCHARGE.description: A flare of electricity is loosed to strike all Pokémon in battle. It may also cause paralysis.

MOVE_LAVA_PLUME.name: Lava Plume
MOVE_LAVA_PLUME.description: An inferno of scarlet flames washes over all Pokémon in battle. It may also inflict burns.

MOVE_LEAF_STORM.name: Leaf Storm
MOVE_LEAF_STORM.description: A storm of sharp leaves is whipped up. The attack’s recoil sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

MOVE_POWER_WHIP.name: Power Whip
MOVE_POWER_WHIP.description: The user violently whirls its vines or tentacles to harshly lash the foe.

MOVE_ROCK_WRECKER.name: Rock Wrecker
MOVE_ROCK_WRECKER.description: The user launches a huge boulder at the foe to attack. It must rest on the next turn, however.

MOVE_CROSS_POISON.name: Cross Poison
MOVE_CROSS_POISON.description: A slashing attack that may also leave the target poisoned. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

MOVE_GUNK_SHOT.name: Gunk Shot
MOVE_GUNK_SHOT.description: The user shoots filthy garbage at the foe to attack. It may also poison the target.

MOVE_IRON_HEAD.name: Iron Head
MOVE_IRON_HEAD.description: The foe slams the target with its steel-hard head. It may also make the target flinch.

MOVE_MAGNET_BOMB.name: Magnet Bomb
MOVE_MAGNET_BOMB.description: The user launches a steel bomb that sticks to the target. This attack will not miss.

MOVE_STONE_EDGE.name: Stone Edge
MOVE_STONE_EDGE.description: The user stabs the foe with a sharpened stone. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

MOVE_CAPTIVATE.name: Captivate
MOVE_CAPTIVATE.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe is charmed into sharply lowering its Sp. Atk stat.

MOVE_STEALTH_ROCK.name: Accelerock
MOVE_STEALTH_ROCK.description: The user shoots tiny shards of sharp stone at the foe. +1 priority.

MOVE_GRASS_KNOT.name: Grass Knot
MOVE_GRASS_KNOT.description: The user snares the foe with grass and trips it. The heavier the foe, the greater the damage.

MOVE_CHATTER.name: Chatter
MOVE_CHATTER.description: The user attacks using a sound wave based on words it has learned. It may also confuse the foe.

MOVE_JUDGMENT.name: Judgment
MOVE_JUDGMENT.description: The user releases countless shots of light. Its type varies with the kind of Plate the user is holding.

MOVE_BUG_BITE.name: Bug Bite
MOVE_BUG_BITE.description: The user bites the foe. If the foe is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

MOVE_CHARGE_BEAM.name: Charge Beam
MOVE_CHARGE_BEAM.description: The user fires a concentrated bundle of electricity. It may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

MOVE_WOOD_HAMMER.name: Wood Hammer
MOVE_WOOD_HAMMER.description: The user slams its rugged body into the foe to attack. The user also sustains serious damage.

MOVE_AQUA_JET.name: Aqua Jet
MOVE_AQUA_JET.description: The user lunges at the foe at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

MOVE_ATTACK_ORDER.name: Attack Order
MOVE_ATTACK_ORDER.description: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

MOVE_DEFEND_ORDER.name: Defend Order
MOVE_DEFEND_ORDER.description: The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

MOVE_HEAL_ORDER.name: Heal Order
MOVE_HEAL_ORDER.description: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.

MOVE_HEAD_SMASH.name: Head Smash
MOVE_HEAD_SMASH.description: The user delivers a life-endangering attack at full power. The user also takes terrible damage.

MOVE_DOUBLE_HIT.name: Double Hit
MOVE_DOUBLE_HIT.description: The user slams the foe with a long tail, vines, etc. The target is hit twice in a row.

MOVE_ROAR_OF_TIME.name: Roar of Time
MOVE_ROAR_OF_TIME.description: The user blasts the foe with power that distorts even time. The user must rest on the next turn.

MOVE_SPACIAL_REND.name: Spacial Rend
MOVE_SPACIAL_REND.description: The user tears the foe along with the space around it. This move has a high critical-hit ratio.

MOVE_LUNAR_DANCE.name: New Moon
MOVE_LUNAR_DANCE.description: The user sacrifices itself to annihilate everyone in sight. The moon dissapears, along with everyone else.

MOVE_CRUSH_GRIP.name: Crush Grip
MOVE_CRUSH_GRIP.description: The foe is crushed with great force. The attack is more powerful the more HP the foe has left.

MOVE_MAGMA_STORM.name: Magma Storm
MOVE_MAGMA_STORM.description: The foe becomes trapped within a maelstrom of fire that rages for two to five turns.

MOVE_DARK_VOID.name: Dark Void
MOVE_DARK_VOID.description: The foe is dragged into a world of total darkness that puts it to sleep.

MOVE_SEED_FLARE.name: Seed Flare
MOVE_SEED_FLARE.description: The user generates a shock wave from within its body. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

MOVE_OMINOUS_WIND.name: Ominous Wind
MOVE_OMINOUS_WIND.description: The user creates a gust of repulsive wind. It may also raise all the user’s stats at once.

MOVE_SHADOW_FORCE.name: Shadow Force
MOVE_SHADOW_FORCE.description: The user disappears, then strikes the foe on the second turn. It hits even if the foe protects itself.

MOVE_HONE_CLAWS.name: Hone Claws
MOVE_HONE_CLAWS.description: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack and Accuracy.

MOVE_WIDE_GUARD.name: Wide Guard
MOVE_WIDE_GUARD.description: The user protects itself and its allies from wide- ranged attacks.

MOVE_GUARD_SPLIT.name: Guard Split
MOVE_GUARD_SPLIT.description: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with the target.

MOVE_POWER_SPLIT.name: Power Split
MOVE_POWER_SPLIT.description: The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with the target.

MOVE_WONDER_ROOM.name: Wonder Room
MOVE_WONDER_ROOM.description: The user creates a bizarre area where Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def swap for five turns.

MOVE_PSYSHOCK.name: Psyshock
MOVE_PSYSHOCK.description: An odd psychic wave attacks the target. This attack does physical damage.

MOVE_VENOSHOCK.name: Venoshock
MOVE_VENOSHOCK.description: The foe is soaked by a special acid. Its power doubles if the foe is poisoned.

MOVE_AUTOTOMIZE.name: Autotomize
MOVE_AUTOTOMIZE.description: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.

MOVE_RAGE_POWDER.name: Rage Powder
MOVE_RAGE_POWDER.description: The user scatters a cloud of powder, making foes attack only the user.

MOVE_TELEKINESIS.name: Telekinesis
MOVE_TELEKINESIS.description: The user makes the target float with psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns.

MOVE_MAGIC_ROOM.name: Magic Room
MOVE_MAGIC_ROOM.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s held items lose effect for five turns.

MOVE_SMACK_DOWN.name: Smack Down
MOVE_SMACK_DOWN.description: A projectile is thrown at the opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground.

MOVE_STORM_THROW.name: Storm Throw
MOVE_STORM_THROW.description: The user strikes the foe fiercely. It always results in a critical hit.

MOVE_FLAME_BURST.name: Flame Burst
MOVE_FLAME_BURST.description: The user attacks the foe with a bursting flame.

MOVE_SLUDGE_WAVE.name: Sludge Wave
MOVE_SLUDGE_WAVE.description: The area around the user is swamped by a giant sludge wave. It may also poison those hit.

MOVE_QUIVER_DANCE.name: Quiver Dance
MOVE_QUIVER_DANCE.description: The user mystically dances, raising its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed.

MOVE_HEAVY_SLAM.name: Heavy Slam
MOVE_HEAVY_SLAM.description: The user slams into the target. The greater the weight difference, the greater the damage.

MOVE_SYNCHRONOISE.name: Synchronoise
MOVE_SYNCHRONOISE.description: Using an odd shock wave, the user damages same-type Pokémon in the surrounding area.

MOVE_ELECTRO_BALL.name: Electro Ball
MOVE_ELECTRO_BALL.description: The user hurls an electric orb. The faster the user is than the foe, the greater the damage.

MOVE_SOAK.name: Soak
MOVE_SOAK.description: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target’s type to Water.

MOVE_FLAME_CHARGE.name: Flame Charge
MOVE_FLAME_CHARGE.description: The user cloaks itself in flames and attacks. It also ups the user’s Speed.

MOVE_COIL.name: Coil
MOVE_COIL.description: The user coils up, raising its Attack, Defense, and accuracy.

MOVE_LOW_SWEEP.name: Low Sweep
MOVE_LOW_SWEEP.description: The user attacks the foe’s legs, lowering its Speed stat.

MOVE_ACID_SPRAY.name: Acid Spray
MOVE_ACID_SPRAY.description: The user spits fluid that melts the foe. It harshly lowers the foe’s Sp. Def.

MOVE_FOUL_PLAY.name: Foul Play
MOVE_FOUL_PLAY.description: The user turns the target’s power against it. Power increases with the foe’s Attack stat.

MOVE_SIMPLE_BEAM.name: Simple Beam
MOVE_SIMPLE_BEAM.description: The user’s mysterious psychic wave changes the target’s Ability to Simple.

MOVE_ENTRAINMENT.name: Entrainment
MOVE_ENTRAINMENT.description: The user dances with an odd rhythm, making the target’s Ability the same as the user’s Ability.

MOVE_AFTER_YOU.name: After You
MOVE_AFTER_YOU.description: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

MOVE_ROUND.name: Round
MOVE_ROUND.description: The user attacks with a song. Others can join in, doing more damage.

MOVE_ECHOED_VOICE.name: Echoed Voice
MOVE_ECHOED_VOICE.description: The user attacks the target with a harsh echo. If used every turn, power increases.

MOVE_CHIP_AWAY.name: Chip Away
MOVE_CHIP_AWAY.description: An attack which is not affected by the target’s stat changes.

MOVE_CLEAR_SMOG.name: Clear Smog
MOVE_CLEAR_SMOG.description: The user throws a clump of special mud that reverts all stat changes.

MOVE_STORED_POWER.name: Stored Power
MOVE_STORED_POWER.description: The user attacks with a stored power that grows with each raised stat.

MOVE_QUICK_GUARD.name: Quick Guard
MOVE_QUICK_GUARD.description: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves.

MOVE_ALLY_SWITCH.name: Ally Switch
MOVE_ALLY_SWITCH.description: The user teleports using a strange power and switches places with one of its allies.

MOVE_SCALD.name: Scald
MOVE_SCALD.description: Boiling water is shot at the foe. It may also cause a burn.

MOVE_SHELL_SMASH.name: Shell Smash
MOVE_SHELL_SMASH.description: Sharply raises Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed, but lowers Defense and Sp. Def.

MOVE_HEAL_PULSE.name: Heal Pulse
MOVE_HEAL_PULSE.description: The user emits a healing pulse that restores a target’s HP by up to half.

MOVE_HEX.name: Hex
MOVE_HEX.description: This attack does double damage to a target affected by a status problem.

MOVE_SKY_DROP.name: Sky Drop
MOVE_SKY_DROP.description: It takes the enemy into the sky, where it can’t attack. It is dropped next turn.

MOVE_SHIFT_GEAR.name: Shift Gear
MOVE_SHIFT_GEAR.description: Rotating its gears, the user raises its Attack and sharply raises its Speed.

MOVE_CIRCLE_THROW.name: Circle Throw
MOVE_CIRCLE_THROW.description: The foe is made to switch out with an ally. In the wild, the battle ends.

MOVE_INCINERATE.name: Incinerate
MOVE_INCINERATE.description: The user burns the foe completely, rendering a held Berry useless.

MOVE_QUASH.name: Quash
MOVE_QUASH.description: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.

MOVE_ACROBATICS.name: Acrobatics
MOVE_ACROBATICS.description: A nimble attack that does double damage if the user has no held item.

MOVE_REFLECT_TYPE.name: Reflect Type
MOVE_REFLECT_TYPE.description: The user reflects the target’s type, making it the same type as the target.

MOVE_RETALIATE.name: Retaliate
MOVE_RETALIATE.description: If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this attack’s damage increases.

MOVE_FINAL_GAMBIT.name: Final Gambit
MOVE_FINAL_GAMBIT.description: The user risks all, dealing damage equal to its HP and then fainting from exhaustion.

MOVE_BESTOW.name: Bestow
MOVE_BESTOW.description: The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn’t holding an item.

MOVE_INFERNO.name: Inferno
MOVE_INFERNO.description: The foe is engulfed by an intense fire that is sure to leave a burn.

MOVE_WATER_PLEDGE.name: Water Pledge
MOVE_WATER_PLEDGE.description: When combined with its fire equivalent, its power increases and a rainbow appears.

MOVE_FIRE_PLEDGE.name: Fire Pledge
MOVE_FIRE_PLEDGE.description: When used with its grass equivalent, its power increases and a vast sea of fire appears.

MOVE_GRASS_PLEDGE.name: Grass Pledge
MOVE_GRASS_PLEDGE.description: When used with its water equivalent, its power increases and a vast swamp appears.

MOVE_VOLT_SWITCH.name: Volt Switch
MOVE_VOLT_SWITCH.description: After attacking, the user switches places with a party Pokémon.

MOVE_STRUGGLE_BUG.name: Struggle Bug
MOVE_STRUGGLE_BUG.description: While resisting, the user attacks the foe, lowering its Sp. Atk stat.

MOVE_BULLDOZE.name: Bulldoze
MOVE_BULLDOZE.description: The user hits all Pokémon in battle by stomping. Lowers Speed of those hit.

MOVE_FROST_BREATH.name: Frost Breath
MOVE_FROST_BREATH.description: The user blows cold air at the foe. It always results in a critical hit.

MOVE_DRAGON_TAIL.name: Dragon Tail
MOVE_DRAGON_TAIL.description: The foe is made to switch out with an ally. In the wild, the battle ends.

MOVE_WORK_UP.name: Work Up
MOVE_WORK_UP.description: The user rouses itself to raise its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

MOVE_ELECTROWEB.name: Electroweb
MOVE_ELECTROWEB.description: The user traps the foe in an electric net. It also lowers the foe’s Speed.

MOVE_WILD_CHARGE.name: Wild Charge
MOVE_WILD_CHARGE.description: The user throws an electrified tackle. It hurts the user a little.

MOVE_DRILL_RUN.name: Drill Run
MOVE_DRILL_RUN.description: The user rotates its body like a drill. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

MOVE_DUAL_CHOP.name: Dual Chop
MOVE_DUAL_CHOP.description: The user hits the foe with two brutal strikes in one turn.

MOVE_HEART_STAMP.name: Heart Stamp
MOVE_HEART_STAMP.description: The foe is hit after a cute act. It may also make the foe flinch.

MOVE_HORN_LEECH.name: Horn Leech
MOVE_HORN_LEECH.description: A harsh attack that absorbs half the damage it inflicted to restore HP.

MOVE_SACRED_SWORD.name: Sacred Sword
MOVE_SACRED_SWORD.description: The user attacks by slicing with a long horn. The target’s stat changes are ignored.

MOVE_RAZOR_SHELL.name: Razor Shell
MOVE_RAZOR_SHELL.description: The foe is cut by sharp shells. It may also lower the foe’s Defense.

MOVE_HEAT_CRASH.name: Heat Crash
MOVE_HEAT_CRASH.description: The user slams down with fire. The more the user outweighs the foe, the greater the damage.

MOVE_LEAF_TORNADO.name: Leaf Tornado
MOVE_LEAF_TORNADO.description: Sharp leaves circle the foe. It may also lower the foe’s accuracy.

MOVE_STEAMROLLER.name: Steamroller
MOVE_STEAMROLLER.description: The user crushes the foe with its body. It may also make the foe flinch.

MOVE_COTTON_GUARD.name: Cotton Guard
MOVE_COTTON_GUARD.description: The user protects itself with cotton, drastically raising its Defense.

MOVE_NIGHT_DAZE.name: Night Daze
MOVE_NIGHT_DAZE.description: The user releases a pitch-black blast at its target. May also lower target’s accuracy.

MOVE_PSYSTRIKE.name: Psystrike
MOVE_PSYSTRIKE.description: An odd psychic wave attacks the target. This attack does physical damage.

MOVE_TAIL_SLAP.name: Tail Slap
MOVE_TAIL_SLAP.description: The use attacks by hitting the target with its hard tail. It hits two to five times in a row.

MOVE_HURRICANE.name: Hurricane
MOVE_HURRICANE.description: The foe is caught in a fierce wind. It may also confuse the foe.

MOVE_HEAD_CHARGE.name: Head Charge
MOVE_HEAD_CHARGE.description: The user charges its head into its foe, using its guard hair. It slightly damages the user.

MOVE_GEAR_GRIND.name: Gear Grind
MOVE_GEAR_GRIND.description: The user attacks by throwing two steel gears at it target. This attack hits twice in a row.

MOVE_SEARING_SHOT.name: Searing Shot
MOVE_SEARING_SHOT.description: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames. It may burn the foes.

MOVE_TECHNO_BLAST.name: Techno Blast
