MOVE_TECHNO_BLAST.description: The user fires a beam of light at its foe. The type changes depending on the Drive held.

MOVE_RELIC_SONG.name: Relic Song
MOVE_RELIC_SONG.description: The user sings an ancient song and attacks the hearts of the listeners. It may induce sleep.

MOVE_SECRET_SWORD.name: Secret Sword
MOVE_SECRET_SWORD.description: The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power in the horn does physical damage to the foe.

MOVE_GLACIATE.name: Glaciate
MOVE_GLACIATE.description: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This lowers their Speed.

MOVE_BOLT_STRIKE.name: Bolt Strike
MOVE_BOLT_STRIKE.description: The user surrounds itself with abundant electricity that can paralyze and charges its target.

MOVE_BLUE_FLARE.name: Blue Flare
MOVE_BLUE_FLARE.description: The user attacks by engulfing the foe in a severe, beautiful, blue flame. It may burn the foe.

MOVE_FIERY_DANCE.name: Fiery Dance
MOVE_FIERY_DANCE.description: Cloaked in flames, the user dances. It may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk.

MOVE_FREEZE_SHOCK.name: Freeze Shock
MOVE_FREEZE_SHOCK.description: A two-turn attack that hits the foe with electrically charged ice. It may paralyze the foe.

MOVE_ICE_BURN.name: Ice Burn
MOVE_ICE_BURN.description: A two-turn attack that surrounds the foe with ultracold, freezing wind. It may burn the foe.

MOVE_SNARL.name: Snarl
MOVE_SNARL.description: The user barks menacingly. It also lowers the foe’s Sp. Atk.

MOVE_ICICLE_CRASH.name: Icicle Crash
MOVE_ICICLE_CRASH.description: Icicles are dropped on the foe. It may also make the foe flinch.

MOVE_V_CREATE.name: V-create
MOVE_V_CREATE.description: The user hurls the hot flame on its forehead. It lowers the user’s Def, Sp. Def, and Speed.

MOVE_FUSION_FLARE.name: Fusion Flare
MOVE_FUSION_FLARE.description: The user brings down a huge flame. It does more damage when influenced by an enormous bolt.

MOVE_FUSION_BOLT.name: Fusion Bolt
MOVE_FUSION_BOLT.description: The user throws down a giant bolt. It does more damage when influenced by an enormous flame.

MOVE_PHANTOM_FORCE.name: Phantom Force
MOVE_PHANTOM_FORCE.description: Invulnerable on turn 1. Breaks protect on turn 2.

MOVE_PARABOLIC_CHARGE.name: ParabolicCharge", "Parabolic Charge
MOVE_PARABOLIC_CHARGE.description: Guzzles HP from opponents. 50% HP recovery. bzzzzt bzzzzt.

MOVE_DRAINING_KISS.name: Draining Kiss
MOVE_DRAINING_KISS.description: Guzzles the HP of the opponent. 50% HP recovery.

MOVE_GRASSY_TERRAIN.name: Grassy Terrain
MOVE_GRASSY_TERRAIN.description: Sprouts Grassy terrain on the field. Boosts grass damage, 1/16 HP recovery.

MOVE_PLAY_ROUGH.name: Play Rough
MOVE_PLAY_ROUGH.description: WHAM WHAM WHAM! 10% chance to lower foe's attack.

MOVE_MOONBLAST.name: Moonblast
MOVE_MOONBLAST.description: Chucks the moon at the opponent. 30% chance to lower Sp. Atk.

MOVE_DIAMOND_STORM.name: Diamond Storm
MOVE_DIAMOND_STORM.description: Shoots a flurry of diamonds at the foes. 50% chance to raise defense.

MOVE_HYPERSPACE_HOLE.name: Hyperspace Hole
MOVE_HYPERSPACE_HOLE.description: Sucks the foe into a space hole. Breaks protect.

MOVE_MYSTICAL_FIRE.name: Mystical Fire
MOVE_MYSTICAL_FIRE.description: Lowers foe's Sp. Atk by one stage.

MOVE_GEOMANCY.name: Geomancy
MOVE_GEOMANCY.description: Double boosts user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed on turn 2.

MOVE_ELECTRIC_TERRAIN.name: ElectricTerrain", "Electric Terrain
MOVE_ELECTRIC_TERRAIN.description: Prevents sleep on grounded Pokemon for 5 turns. Boosts electric moves.

MOVE_DAZZLING_GLEAM.name: Dazzling Gleam
MOVE_DAZZLING_GLEAM.description: Wow. So bright. Uwu fairy light.

MOVE_NUZZLE.name: Nuzzle
MOVE_NUZZLE.description: Paralyzes foe. Just better than Thunder Wave.

MOVE_OBLIVION_WING.name: Oblivion Wing
MOVE_OBLIVION_WING.description: Yveltal uses its wings to suck HP from the foe. Idk how this works.

MOVE_LANDS_WRATH.name: Land’s Wrath
MOVE_LANDS_WRATH.description: The land is angry. Hits both opponents.

MOVE_PRECIPICE_BLADES.name: Precipice Blade", "Precipice Blades
MOVE_PRECIPICE_BLADES.description: User slices the foe with sharp rocks. Groudon is happy.

MOVE_DRAGON_ASCENT.name: Dragon Ascent
MOVE_DRAGON_ASCENT.description: Rayquaza obliterates the opponent. -1 Def/Sp.Def for the user.

MOVE_HYPERSPACE_FURY.name: Hyperspace Fury
MOVE_HYPERSPACE_FURY.description: Outer space hurts the opponent. Can't miss!

MOVE_FIRST_IMPRESSION.name: FirstImpression", "First Impression
MOVE_FIRST_IMPRESSION.description: Hit's first on user's first turn on the field.

MOVE_PSYCHIC_TERRAIN.name: Psychic Terrain
MOVE_PSYCHIC_TERRAIN.description: Blocks priority moves on grounded Pokemon. Boosts Psychic moves.

MOVE_LUNGE.name: Lunge
MOVE_LUNGE.description: Lowers foe's Atk by one stage.

MOVE_BRUTAL_SWING.name: Brutal Swing
MOVE_BRUTAL_SWING.description: Brutally swings something around. Hits everyone.

MOVE_FLEUR_CANNON.name: Fleur Cannon
MOVE_FLEUR_CANNON.description: Blasts opponent with lots of flowers. -2 Sp. Atk recoil.

MOVE_LIQUIDATION.name: Liquidation
MOVE_LIQUIDATION.description: May lower opponent's Defense on hit.

MOVE_PRISMATIC_LASER.name: Prismatic Laser
MOVE_PRISMATIC_LASER.description: User must recharge on the next turn.

MOVE_BODY_PRESS.name: Body Press
MOVE_BODY_PRESS.description: Uses user's Def stat for damage.

MOVE_APPLE_ACID.name: Apple Acid
MOVE_APPLE_ACID.description: Guaranteed to lower foe's Sp. Def by 2 stages.

MOVE_SPIRIT_BREAK.name: Spirit Break
MOVE_SPIRIT_BREAK.description: Lowers opponent's Sp. Atk. by one stage.

MOVE_ETERNABEAM.name: Eternabeam
MOVE_ETERNABEAM.description: User must recharge on turn two. That's a lotta damage!

MOVE_EXPANDING_FORCE.name: Expanding Force
MOVE_EXPANDING_FORCE.description: Boosted damage and spread move on Psychic Terrain.

MOVE_WICKED_BLOW.name: Wicked Blow
MOVE_WICKED_BLOW.description: Always results in a critical hit.

MOVE_SURGING_STRIKES.name: Surging Strikes
MOVE_SURGING_STRIKES.description: Always results in a critical hit.

MOVE_DRAGON_ENERGY.name: Dragon Energy
MOVE_DRAGON_ENERGY.description: Regidrago wanted to use Water Spout but got this instead.

MOVE_SPRINGTIDE_STORM.name: SpringtideStorm", "Springtide Storm
MOVE_SPRINGTIDE_STORM.description: Spring is here! Goodbye Atk stat!

MOVE_WAVE_CRASH.name: Wave Crash
MOVE_WAVE_CRASH.description: Recoils user by 1/3 of damage dealt.

MOVE_SHED_TAIL.name: Shed Tail
MOVE_SHED_TAIL.description: The user creates a decoy using its own HP, then swaps places with a party Pokémon in waiting.
